thread.title: Carolyn
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Carolyn

author: Carolyn
title: Carolyn
text:
I ordered a piece of plexiglass online for pick-up. I waited over a week before I finally called to see when it might be ready. I was told at that point that the plexiglass was probably ready the day after I ordered it. It would have been nice if someone would have let me know that earlier, since I could have picked it up when I was over in that area.
The company is great, and I have nothing but good to say about the products and assembly.
